LanguageData.RWBY_Raven_Sword.label: Omen
LanguageData.RWBY_Raven_Sword.description: Omen weapon is a long, single-edged, one-handed sword of Japanese design, with a trigger built into the hilt and cross-guard rather than the traditional tsuba.
LanguageData.RWBY_Raven_Sword.tools.0.label: 刀尖
LanguageData.RWBY_Raven_Sword.tools.1.label: 刀刃

LanguageData.RWBY_Raven_Scabbard.label: Omen's Scabbard
LanguageData.RWBY_Raven_Scabbard.description: Omen's scabbard contains a rotary chamber filled with various types of Dust blades.
LanguageData.RWBY_Raven_Scabbard.tools.0.label: side
